org.apache.beam.sdk.testing

Interface TestPipelineOptions

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HasDisplayData, PipelineOptions
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    TestDataflowPipelineOptions, TestSparkPipelineOptions

    public interface TestPipelineOptions
extends PipelineOptions
    TestPipelineOptions is a set of options for test pipelines.
    See Also:
    TestPipeline
